mapper.select: SELECT s.shNum,s.empNum, s.codeBid,s.startTime, s.endTime,s.memo, e.empName,cb.name AS codeBName,m.memName FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN Employee e ON s.empNum = e.empNum LEFT JOIN CodeB cb ON s.codeBid = cb.codeBid LEFT JOIN Registration r ON s.shNum = r.shNum LEFT JOIN Member m ON r.memNum = m.memNum ORDER BY s.startTime ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.SHNUM, s.EMPNUM, s.CODEBID, s.STARTTIME, s.ENDTIME, s.MEMO, e.EMPNAME, cb.NAME AS CODEBNAME, m.MEMNAME, r.MEMNUM FROM SCHEDULE s LEFT JOIN REGISTRATION r ON s.SHNUM = r.SHNUM LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEMNUM = m.MEMNUM LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON s.EMPNUM = e.EMPNUM LEFT JOIN CODEB cb ON s.CODEBID = cb.CODEBID WHERE s.SHNUM = #{shNum} ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT s.shNum,s.empNum, s.codeBid,s.startTime, s.endTime,s.memo, e.empName,cb.name AS codeBName, m.memName FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN Employee e ON s.empNum = e.empNum LEFT JOIN CodeB cb ON s.codeBid = cb.codeBid LEFT JOIN Registration r ON s.shNum = r.shNum LEFT JOIN Member m ON r.memNum = m.memNum WHERE s.empNum = #{empNum} ORDER BY s.startTime ASC

SELECT s.shNum,s.empNum, s.codeBid,s.startTime, s.endTime,s.memo, e.empName,cb.name AS codeBName, m.memName FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN Employee e ON s.empNum = e.empNum LEFT JOIN CodeB cb ON s.codeBid = cb.codeBid LEFT JOIN Registration r ON s.shNum = r.shNum LEFT JOIN Member m ON r.memNum = m.memNum WHERE s.startTime BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY s.startTime ASC
